column2: "Na iyinom ekyir no
"Na obohun Jewnyi bi wɔ hɔ a ne dzin dze Akwila a wɔwoo no wɔ Pontus na ofi Itali baa hɔ nnkyɛree
column4: osiandɛ nna Klaudius ahyɛ dɛ Jewfo nyina mfi Rome nkɔ: na ɔbaa hɔn nkyɛn;"

column2: "na dɛ ɔnye hɔn yɛ edwuma kor ntsi
column4: na wɔyɛɛ edwuma; nna wɔyɛ ntamadanyɛfo."

column2: "Na daa ahomgyeda ɔbɛkaa asɛm wɔ nhyiamudan mu
column3: dɛ ɔrema Jewfo nye Griikfo agye edzi."

column2: "Na Silas nye Timoti fii Masidonia sianee bae no
column4: na odzii dase kyerɛɛ Jewfo no dɛ Jesus nye Kraest no."

column2: "Na wɔyɛɛ kyikyiikyi
column4: ɔpopoo n’atar mu kaa kyerɛɛ hɔn dɛ
column5: Hom bɔgyaa ngu homankasa hom etsifi: emi dze
column6: minndzi so; ofitsi ndɛ mobɔkɔ Amanamamfo no hɔ."

column2: "Na ofii hɔ kɔr obi a ne dzin dze Titus Justus a ɔyɛ nyamesuronyi a ne dan wɔ nhyiamudan no ho no ne fie."
"Na Krispus
column3: nhyiamudan mu panyin nye ne fiemba nyina gyee Ewuradze dzii; na Korintefo no pii tsee no

column2: "Na Ewuradze see Paul wɔ enyido adzehu mu anadwe dɛ
"na emi mara meka wo ho
column3: na obiara rennka wo mmbɛyɛ wo bɔn bi; osiandɛ mowɔ nkorɔfo pii wɔ kurow yi mu."

column2: "Na ɔtsenaa hɔ afrenhyia abosoom esia kyerɛkyerɛɛ hɔn Nyankopɔn asɛm no."
"Na Galio dzii Akaia ambrado no
column3: Jewfo no yɛɛ adwenkor soɛɛr Paul do
column4: na wɔdze no baa asɛndzi egua enyim dɛ
column6: "Oyi otu nyimpa aso suma dɛ wɔnsom Nyankopɔn wɔ kwan bi do a otsia hɛn mbra."

column2: "Na Paul reyɛ ebue n’ano no
column5: sɛ ɔyɛ mfom anaa ehuhusɛm bi a omuo a nkyɛ ɔsɛ dɛ misie hom ho abotar tsie hom;"

column2: "na sɛ ɔyɛ asɛm nye edzin nye hom mbra ho asɛmbisa a
column4: homara hom nhwɛ: na emi dze
column5: memmpɛ dɛ meyɛ dɛm asɛm yi ho ɔtsɛmbuafo."

column2: "Na ɔpaam hɔn fii asɛndzi egua enyim hɔ."
"Na hɔn nyina suoo nhyiamudan mu panyin Sostenes mu hwee no asɛndzi egua enyim hɔ. Na Galio dze
column3: ɔammfa yinom mu biara annyɛ hwee."

column2: "Na Paul daa ho tsenaa hɔ nda kakra ara no
column4: na ofii hɔ faa nsuenyi kɔr Siria
column5: na Prisila nye Akwila ka no ho; na ɔpraa ne tsir wɔ Kenkreae; osiandɛ nna oedzi nsew bi."

column2: "Na wɔbaa Efeso
column3: na ogyaa hɔn hɔ; na nankasa dze ɔkɔr nhyiamudan mu nye Jewfo kɛyɛɛ mpɛnsampɛnsamu dzendzenndzen."

column2: "Na wɔserɛɛ no dɛ ɔntsena hɔn nkyɛn nkyɛr kakra
"na ɔkraa hɔn dɛ
column4: mebɛsan aba hom nkyɛn bio no

column2: "Na odwiir daadze wɔ Kaesarea no
"Na odzii hɔ mber kakra no
column3: ofii hɔ kekyiin Galatia nye Frigyia nkurow mu esiado esiado

column2: "Na Jewnyi bi a ne dzin dze Apollos a wɔwoo no wɔ Alɛksandria na ɔyɛ nyimpa n’ano atsew yie
"Nyimpa yi na wɔakyerɛkyerɛ no Ewuradze kwan no mu; na ɔyɛ hyew wɔ sunsum mu
column3: ɔkae na ɔkyerɛkyerɛɛ dza ɔfa Jesus ho no pɛpɛɛpɛ
column4: naaso nna John enuma no ho asɛm nko na onyim;"

column2: "na ɔhyɛɛ ase dze ndam kasae wɔ nhyiamudan mu. Ɔno na Prisila nye Akwila tsiee no no
column4: na wɔkyerɛkyerɛɛ no ma ɔkɔr kan wɔ Nyankopɔn kwan no mu ara yie."

column2: "Na onyaa adwen dɛ obotwa mu akɔ Akaia no
column3: enuanom no hyɛɛ no dzen na wɔkyerɛɛw nwoma kɛmaa esuafo no dɛ wɔngye no; na ɔbae no
column4: ɔboaa hɔn a wɔnam adom do agye edzi no pii
column6: "osiandɛ ɔkaa Jewfo no gui wɔ bagua mu
column7: na ɔnam kyerɛwsɛm no do kyerɛɛ mu kofee dɛ Jesus nye Kraest no."
